an7.6:1.3: Saddhadhanam, siladhanam, hiridhanam, ottappadhanam, sutadhanam, cagadhanam, pannadhanam.
an7.6:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako saddho hoti, saddahati tathagatassa bodhim:
an7.6:2.3: ‘itipi so bhagava araham sammasambuddho …pe… buddho bhagava’ti.
an7.6:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako panatipata pativirato hoti …pe… suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato hoti.
an7.6:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako hirima hoti, hiriyati kayaduccaritena vaciduccaritena manoduccaritena, hiriyati papakanam akusalanam dhammanam samapattiya.
an7.6:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako ottappi hoti, ottappati kayaduccaritena vaciduccaritena manoduccaritena, ottappati papakanam akusalanam dhammanam samapattiya.
an7.6:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako bahussuto hoti sutadharo sutasannicayo. Ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti. Tatharupassa dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha.
an7.6:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacago payatapani vosaggarato yacayogo danasamvibhagarato.
an7.6:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasavako pannava hoti …pe… samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
